{"post_stream":{"posts":[{"id":3109441,"name":"","username":"nstrike","avatar_template":"/user_avatar/www.chiefdelphi.com/nstrike/{size}/167038_2.png","created_at":"2022-12-10T23:06:04.673Z","cooked":"

We got DOOM running on our roboRIO

GitHub

GitHub - BroncBotz3481/RioDoom: Doom port for the NI RoboRIO

Doom port for the NI RoboRIO. Contribute to BroncBotz3481/RioDoom development by creating an account on GitHub.

Wouldn’t have been possible without Team 303’s original port!
